document.full_text: yemeni forces opened fire on demonstrators in three cities on wednesday, killing at least nine and wounding scores in escalating bloodshed that could ramp up public fury at the president's refusal to step down.
document.title: yemen forces fire on protests in 3 cities; 9 dead
lines_and_colors: yemeni forces opened fire on demonstrators in three cities on wednesday, killing at least nine and wounding scores in escalating bloodshed that could ramp up public fury at the president's refusal to step down.
